name: Twitter Dark + Minimal
description: Based off of the great Twitter Flat Dark & Clean theme. Sets default border radius to 2px for everything Removes reply/like/retweet counts Completely hides footer ads and live video feeds
css:
@-moz-document domain("twitter.com") {
/*      /* Twitter Dark + Minimal */
/* by rouzbeh84 */
/* Inspired by MarUlberg's "Twitter Flat Dark & Clean" */
/*	"You might have missed"     	*/

[data-item-type="recap_entry"] {
	display: none !important;
}
/*	"Who to follow"     	*/

.WtfLargeCarouselStreamItem {
	display: none !important;
}
/*	Detail Color    	*/

.vellip,
.vellip:before,
.vellip:after,
.conversation-module > li:after,
.conversation-module > li:before,
.ThreadedConversation-tweet:not(.is-hiddenAncestor) ~ .ThreadedConversation-tweet:before,

.dropdown-menu .dropdown-link,

.column-title span,

p.tweet-text a,
.RichEditor-scrollContainer div,
.DMActivity-container .fullname,
.stats a,
.stats a:hover,
.DMPopoverMenu {
	color: #CCCCCC !important;
}
body,
button,
div,
dt,
dl,
dd,
a,
b,
h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6,
h7,
input,
textarea,
label,
li,
p,
s,
select,
option,
small,
span,
strong,
table,
th,
td,
hr,
form,
blockquote,
legend {
	text-shadow: 0px 0px #000000 !important;
	text-decoration: none !important;
}
time,
time a,
.stream-item-header span:not(.Icon),
.Icon--verified:before,
.new-tweets-bar,
.top-timeline-tweetbox .timeline-tweet-box .tweet-form.condensed .tweet-box,
.icon-btn,
.ProfileTweet-actionList .ProfileTweet-actionCount,

/*	Round Edges	*/

.DashboardProfileCard,
.Trends,
.roaming-module:not(.trends-container),
.WhoToFollow,
.SidebarFilterModule,
.ProfileCard,
.AdaptiveRelatedSearches,
.ListCreationModule,
.SummaryCard-image > div,
button,
.js-prompt-layout-content > div,
.AdaptiveNewsRelatedHeadlines,
.MomentsGuidePage-content a:-webkit-any-link {
	border-radius: 5px !important;
}
.bg-r-white {
	border-radius: 0px !important;
}
.ProfileHeading-content {
	border-radius: 5px 5px 0px 0px !important;
}
body.ProfilePage .AppContent-main > .Grid.Grid--withGutter > .Grid-cell.u-size1of3.u-lg-size1of4 {
	border-radius: 0px 0px 5px 5px !important;
}
/*	Filter       	*/

.DirectMessage--sent .DirectMessage-text,
._1rmOI-BQ ._29kyA7wX {
	-webkit-filter: brightness(70%) contrast(130%) grayscale(0.5) !important;
	filter: brightness(70%) contrast(130%) grayscale(0.5) !important;
}
.DirectMessage--sent .DirectMessage-text .js-tweet-text-container,
._1rmOI-BQ ._29kyA7wX span {
	-webkit-filter: brightness(200%) invert(0) !important;
	filter: brightness(200%) invert(0) !important;
}
.column-holder header i:before,
.PromptbirdPrompt .Icon--close:before {
	-webkit-filter: brightness(50%) invert(1) grayscale(1) !important;
	filter: brightness(50%) invert(1) grayscale(1) !important;
}
#global-nav-search {
	-webkit-filter: grayscale(1) !important;
	filter: grayscale(1) !important;
}
/*	Hidden           	*/

.ProfileHeaderCardEditing-userColor.ProfileHeaderCardEditing-item.dropdown,
.trend-item-stats,
.qb_4uBPl._2Axq_bxo._3f2NsD-H {
	display: none !important;
}
.Trends,
.roaming-module:not(.trends-container),
.WhoToFollow,
.SidebarFilterModule,
.AdaptiveRelatedSearches,
.ListCreationModule,
.LiveVideoShareButton {
	opacity: 0 !important;
	transition: 500ms !important;
}
.Trends:hover,
.roaming-module:not(.trends-container):hover,
.WhoToFollow:hover,
.SidebarFilterModule:hover,
.AdaptiveRelatedSearches:hover,
.ListCreationModule:hover,
.LiveVideoShareButton:hover {
	opacity: 1 !important;
	transition: 200ms !important;
}
/*	Other           	*/

.DMActivity-footer {
	border-right: 14px solid;
}
ul.js-nav-links > li > a {
	border-left: 14px solid;
	border-top: 0px solid;
	border-bottom: 0px solid;
}
ul.js-nav-links > li:first-child > a {
	border-top: 2px solid;
}
ul.js-nav-links > li:last-child > a {
	border-bottom: 2px solid;
}
.ProfileHeading-content {
	margin-bottom: 0px !important;
}
.ProfileCard-userFields .Icon--verified:before {
	margin-left: -3px !important;
}
#global-actions>li:hover>a,
#global-actions>li.active>a {
	height: 42px;
}
.ProfileTweet-action--favorite .Icon--heart,
.ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite .Icon--heart {

li.SharedNavBar-navItem .SharedNavBar-textButton,

	border-bottom: 0px solid;
	transition: .2s !important;

.Caret--top:before,
.Caret--top.Caret--stroked:after {
	border-top-width: 0;
	border-left-color: transparent !important;
	border-right-color: transparent !important;
	border-top-color: transparent !important;
}
.Caret--right:before,
.Caret--right.Caret--stroked:after {
	border-right-width: 0!important;
	border-bottom-color: transparent !important;
	border-right-color: transparent !important;
	border-top-color: transparent !important;
}
.Caret--bottom:before,
.Caret--bottom.Caret--stroked:after {
	border-bottom-width: 0;
	border-left-color: transparent !important;
	border-right-color: transparent !important;
	border-bottom-color: transparent !important;
}
.Caret--left:before,
.Caret--left.Caret--stroked:after {
	border-left-width: 0;
	border-left-color: transparent !important;
	border-top-color: transparent !important;
	border-bottom-color: transparent !important;
}
/*	Scroll Bar        	*/

*::-webkit-scrollbar {
	width: 14px !important;
}
*::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
	min-height: 35px !important;
	background: #424242 !important;
	border: none !important;
	border-radius: 0px !important;
}
*::-webkit-scrollbar-track-piece {
	background-color: #212121 !important;
	border: none !important;
}
.ProfileTweet-actionCount,
.LiveVideoHomePageModuleContainer,
.u-cf,
.Footer-adsModule,
#profile-hover-container {
	display: none;
	z-index: 0 !important;
	position: initial;
}
*,
* > button {
	border-radius: 2px !important
}
.new-tweets-bar {
	background-color: #111;
}
.new-tweets-bar:hover {
	background-color: #111;
}
}
